title: STRONGER GAZE WITH MIRROR / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
In this video Dr. Marco Paret is doing a Masterclass in Bulgaria and he is demonstrating you a powerful non-verbal hypnosis technique for achieving stronger gaze using a mirror. Eyes are said to be the “windows of the soul”. Here a very simple exercise to begin with. Go in front of a mirror at about 20 cm. Look at yourself between the eyebrows, in the spot where the indian tradition put the ajna chakra (or even a little below). Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
